tip.text: If you use Crowdroid to sign in Twitter before July 9, 2011, you perhaps can not use direct message function. Please register Twitter account again.
SINA's authorication method has changed, please register a new account!
Added voice input support
Support Tencent Weibo
Improved user interfaces
The New Features of Crowdroid 2.5.0
★ Support Sohu Weibo.
★ Optimize the function of reply in Twitter、Follow5 and Crowdroid for Business.
★ Optimize the function of pictures uploaded.
★ Add the Notification function of QT in Twitter.
★ Delete the function of Google translation.
★ Fixed the User Login of Sina,Tencent and Sohu.
http://www.anhuioss.com/en/crowdroid/manual3.html
http://www.anhuioss.com/en/crowdroid/manual4.html
http://www.anhuioss.com/en/crowdroid/manual5.html
★ Optimized error messages.
★ Fixed the multi-tweet service.
★ Canceled the Follow5 Service.
★ Other bugs fixed.
★ The login screen has been improved.
★ The tag icon has been improved.
★ Add “Casual Watch” in Twitter.
★ Getting GPS information has been improved.
★ Notification function has been improved.
★ Auto refresh function has been improved.
★ Other bugs fixed.
★ Added the function of “Hot Retweets” in Tencent Weibo. Fixed the retweet and comment layout in Tencent Weibo.
★ You can add topics in Sina Weibo 、Tencent Weibo and Sohu Weibo when you tweet.
★ Added the function of auto refresh in casual watch.Added the function of auto refresh in keyword-search.
★ You can view favourite list and set it.
★ You can download the latest Crowdroid version and detect the latest Version automatically.
★ Added the function of themes, you can download the provided themes.
★ Other bugs fixed.
★ Improved the UI and User Experiences.
★ Improved the Login Interface.
★ Improved the main Interface.
★ The main Interface icons are all on the right of Interface.
★ Setting and application square icons are all on the bottom of Interface.
★ Application square.
★ User(s) or keyword(s) search.
★ Setting the other convenience function(s).
★ Setting Interface.
★ Added the function of language selection、translation、text size、wallpaper change and software update remind.
★ Improved the Interface of New Tweet.
★ Image-previewing in retweeting with image-attachment.
★ Improved image-previewing(and file-downloading) features.
★ New-added the retweet's page and insert topics features.
★ New-added the user-profile modification on Tencent and Sohu Weibo.
★ New-added the view of Direct Message.
★ New-added Official weibo account in order to reply feedback conveniently.
★ Modified to multi-accounts adding and clearing the cache.
★ New-added the color-selecting to set the background and fond colors.
★ To add send private message function, push information, review information added expressions and @ a user function.
★ To add Twitter and Twitter-proxy are inserted into the topic and insert @ username function.
★ To add @ a user and insert topic automatically prompt and the preservation of historical records function.
★ To add Twitter and Twitter-proxy subscription and create a list of features.
★ To add the function of have a look at the Twitter-proxy server.
★ Repair of CFB according to the user username search micro-blog function.
★ Repair of Twitter interested users classification search function.
★ Repair of Micro-blog picture display or not display setting function.
★ According to the ANR (Application Not Responding), Repair of automatic update functionality.
★ Repair in the Android2.3.3 and Android4.0.2 running on the system function.
★ Relayout The insertion Expression.
★ Repair of CFB picture preview and download function.
★ Repair of Twitter image server's big picture preview function.
★ Added renren.com.
★ Added the new function of sharing, state, journal, album and new visitor in renren.com.
★ Added the function of send state in renren.com.
★ Added Personal Home Page (PHP) in renren. Users can look over the basic information, friends number, visitors number, states number, journals number and albums number.
★ Users can look over the list of journals and albums.
★ Added the function of manage journal in renren. Users can publish journals and check it.
★ Added the function of manage albums in renren. Users can establish albums and upload photos.
★ Added the function of search users by category. According to birthday and hometown to search classmate or colleague.
★ Added the web singn in page of renren.
★ Added notification function of sharing, state, journal and album.
★ Repaired of Twitter display and retweet messages in sohu micro-blog.
★ Repaired of @message.
★ Repaired of Application Square.
★ Repaired of background image settings.
★ Repaired of user search.
★ Repaired add account function.
★ Modified the login interface.
★ Fixed the Login Interface,make it clear.
★ Add LBS（Location Based Service） in Twitter、Sina、Tencent and RenRen.
★ Repair of retweet notification in Twitter.
★ Added the function of edit user's head portrait in Tencent.
★ Added the function of public page in RenRen.
★ Added the function of search blog in Sohu.
★ New-added the feature of mood-releasing and mood-getting in Tencent Weibo.
★ New-added the feature of label-adding,label-deleting,label-getting,user-searching by label and label-getting on user instited in Tencent Weibo and Sina Weibo.
★ New-added the feature of Celebrity list in Tencent Weibo.
★ New-added the feature of getting Location timeline in Tencent Weibo.
★ Other bugs fixed.
